translations: 狡猾的，狡诈的（crafty 的比较级）

sentences.sentence: If this is the case, then Obama may be craftier than anyone has assumed.
sentences.translation: 如果真是这样的话，那么奥巴马可能比大家想的要狡猾得多。

sentences.sentence: Third, regulators need to be craftier when estimating the hit that capital must absorb.
sentences.translation: 第三，监管者在估计资本应包含哪些内容时应该讲究技巧。

sentences.sentence: Face soldier Rabbids, some bigger ones that are a little craftier... and even pirate Rabbids!
sentences.translation: 应对一些较大且有点狡猾的兔子士兵，甚至兔子海盗！
